name: pixvault
description: Low-cost photo and video storage solution using AWS S3 Glacier

scripts.dev: npm run docker:up && npm run dev:all
scripts.docker:up:
docker-compose up -d && echo 'Services started! ðŸš€
PostgreSQL: localhost:5432
LocalStack: localhost:4566
MinIO: localhost:9000 (Console: localhost:9001)'
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.setup: [ ! -f .env ] && cp .env.example .env || true && npm install && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run docker:up to start services'
scripts.clean: npm run docker:clean && rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/target
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U pixvault -d pixvault
